name: Skull and Bones M?stery BP 2018
additionalNotes:
The first M?stery release since 2015. The company declined to disclose any further details about the cigar, but it’s listed as “BP” a likely sign that it is box-pressed.

The M?stery series started in 2010, with a release in the Skull and Bones line that didn’t have any blend information given – some years even leaving out production numbers or factory information – shrouding the series in, well – mystery.
